seniority_level.evidence: Minimum 4+ years experience required, title is 'Data Engineer' without junior/associate prefix, responsibilities include complex pipeline development and cloud platform work

job_family.evidence: Job title explicitly states 'Data Engineer', core responsibilities focus on building data pipelines, processing data with Spark, and working with big data technologies

sub_specialty.evidence: Explicitly mentions 'Experience in developing streaming pipelines' and 'Exposure to streaming solutions and message brokers like Kafka technologies'

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of people management, mentoring, or technical leadership responsibilities; focus is on individual contribution to pipeline development and testing

primary_cloud.evidence: Explicitly mentions 'Azure Cloud Data Platform' multiple times, lists Azure-specific services (Azure HDInsight, Azure Data Factory, Synapse), and requires 3+ years experience on Azure

secondary_clouds.evidence: No other cloud platforms (AWS, GCP) are mentioned in the job description or requirements

processing_paradigm.evidence: Mentions both 'streaming pipelines' and batch processing via Spark/Hadoop ecosystem; no exclusive focus on one paradigm

orchestrator_category.evidence: Azure Data Factory and Synapse are explicitly mentioned as required technologies, which are cloud-native orchestration tools

storage_layer.evidence: Mentions HDFS (lake), Azure Data Platform (warehouse), and Synapse (lakehouse), indicating exposure to multiple storage paradigms

remote_restriction.evidence: Location specified as 'Kochi, Kerala, India' with 'onsite' work model, indicating regional restriction

timezone_focus.evidence: Location restricted to India (Kochi, Kerala), implying India-specific timezone focus

relocation_required.evidence: Onsite work model with specific location (Kochi, Kerala, India) implies relocation may be required for non-residents

h1b_friendly.evidence: No mention of visa sponsorship; location is in India, suggesting local hiring only

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No mention of student visa support; location in India suggests local hiring with work authorization requirement

citizenship_required.evidence: Location in India with onsite requirement implies authorization to work in India is required, but no citizenship requirement stated

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Employment type stated as 'full_time' and 'permanent', typical of W2 employment

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits listed in the job posting or extracted data

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No explicit career tracks mentioned; general reference to working in 'IBM Consulting Client Innovation Centers' without growth path details

mentorship_signals.evidence: Mentions working in delivery centers with technical expertise, implying collaboration with experienced team members, but no formal mentorship program stated

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No mention of promotions, advancement, or career progression in the job description

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, lateral moves, or exploring other roles within IBM

career_tracks_available.evidence: No specific career tracks (IC, management, specialist, architect) mentioned in the job posting

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear distinction between 'Required' and 'Preferred' skills, with 15+ must-have technical skills and 2 nice-to-have skills

scope_definition.evidence: Focused role description centered on data engineering with specific technologies (Spark, Azure, Kafka) and responsibilities (pipeline development, testing)

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: 4+ years experience required for senior-level responsibilities; skills align with typical senior data engineer expectations (Spark, cloud platforms, streaming)
